verses.verse: <S%G4771>You<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5043>child,<s%> be <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G4771>You<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> must endure <S%G2553>hardship,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

No <S%G3762>soldier<s%> on <S%G4754>duty<s%> entangles <S%G1707>himself<s%> in the affairs <S%G4230>of<s%> <S%G979>life,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> him who enrolled him as a <S%G4758>soldier.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532>Also,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> competes in <S%G118>athletics,<s%> <S%G4737>he<s%> <S%G3756>isn't<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%> <S%G3362>unless<s%> he has <S%G118>competed<s%> by the <S%G3545>rules.<s%>
The <S%G1092>farmers<s%> who <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3335>be<s%> the <S%G4412>first<s%> to get a <S%G3335>share<s%> of the <S%G4413>crops.<s%>

<S%G3539>Consider<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1063>and<s%> may the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G4907>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G1453><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> Good <S%G2098>News,<s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> which I suffer <S%G2553>hardship<s%> <S%G3360>to<s%> the point of <S%G1199>chains<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2557>criminal.<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1210><s%> <S%G3756>isn't<s%> <S%G1210>chained.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> I <S%G5278>endure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G1223>ones<s%>' sake, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5177>may<s%> <S%G5177>obtain<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G5124>glory.<s%>
This <S%G3056>saying<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful:<s%> <S%G1063>"For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we died <S%G4880>with<s%> <S%G4800>him,<s%> we will <S%G2532>also<s%> live with <S%G4800>him.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G5278>endure,<s%> we <S%G4821>will<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> reign <S%G4821>with<s%> <S%G1487>him.<s%> If we <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G2548>him,<s%> he also will <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> we are <S%G569>faithless,<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%> <S%G1410>He<s%> <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>"

<S%G5279>Remind<s%> them of these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G1263>charging<s%> them in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that they <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3054>argue<s%> about <S%G3054>words,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G5539>profit,<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2692>subverting<s%> of those who <S%G191>hear.<s%>

Give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> by <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G2040>workman<s%> who <S%G422>doesn't<s%> need to be ashamed, <S%G3718>properly<s%> handling the <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G225>Truth.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G952>empty<s%> <S%G2757>chatter,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it will <S%G4298>go<s%> <S%G4119>further<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G2192>will<s%> <S%G3542>consume<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1044>gangrene,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5372>Philetus;<s%>

men <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G795>erred<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1096>that<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>past,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G396>overthrowing<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5100>some.<s%>

<S%G3305>However<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4731>firm<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G2476>stands,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> those who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G846>his,<s%>" <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G868>"Let<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> who <S%G3686>names<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5547>Lord<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3749>clay.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739>Some<s%> are <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G819>dishonor.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1571>purges<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these,<s%> he will <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G2173>for<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2173>suitable<s%> for the <S%G1203>master<s%>'s <S%G2173>use,<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

<S%G5343>Flee<s%> <S%G1161>from<s%> <S%G3512>youthful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1377>pursue<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> those who <S%G1941>call<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3868>refuse<s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G521>ignorant<s%> <S%G2214>questionings,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1080>generate<s%> <S%G3163>strife.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3164>quarrel,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2261>gentle<s%> <S%G4314>towards<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> able to <S%G1317>teach,<s%> <S%G420>patient,<s%>

<S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4236>gentleness<s%> <S%G3811>correcting<s%> those who oppose <S%G475>him:<s%> <S%G3379><s%> <S%G3379>perhaps<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> leading <S%G1519>to<s%> a full <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they may recover <S%G366>themselves<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>'s <S%G3803>snare,<s%> having been taken <S%G2221>captive<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G2307>will.<s%>
